https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9gWaWMhAaWU3vRzz6Ox2X4EoM1X.jpg To celebrate the release of The Hobbit, two Lord of the Rings super-fans attempt to walk over 120 miles across New Zealand from the filming location of Hobbiton to the real life Mount Doom in only six days. A Simple Walk Into Mordor
